data.expected_result: It should pop up like it does when use chrome tabs is disabled. It used to pop up before the in app browser was introduced
data.short_description: The app picker slides with the in app browser settings enabled
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user settings > behavior - Enable use chrome tabs - Click on a link that can be opened using more than 1 app. Make sure you don't have a default app already selected for it (I clicked on a trello link with the trello app and google chrome installed) - Observe that the app picker slides
